com.opensymphony.xwork2.security

Interface NotExcludedAcceptedPatternsChecker

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AcceptedPatternsChecker, ExcludedPatternsChecker
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultNotExcludedAcceptedPatternsChecker

    public interface NotExcludedAcceptedPatternsChecker
extends ExcludedPatternsChecker, AcceptedPatternsChecker
    Used across different places to check if given string is not excluded and is accepted
    Since:
    2.5.27
    See Also:
    here
